backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Blue Panthers sign-up backend with user profile management, position-based sign-up submission with capacity validation, and access-controlled queries for retrieving sign-ups.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping the protected '/signups' page feature to its implementing files (App.tsx, Layout.tsx, SignUpsPage.tsx) and related components, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the Blue Panthers sign-up app UI.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file setting up Tailwind base styles and defining CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Blue Panthers NCAA Sign-Up app, loading the React app via main.tsx and setting the page title and meta description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component defining four TanStack Router routes: '/' (SignUpPage), '/signups' (SignUpsPage), '/owner' (OwnerDashboard), and '/admin' (AdminPage).
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component displaying the Blue Panthers branding, location, and a stats bar showing position slot availability using capacity constants from useQueries.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Sticky-header layout wrapper with navigation links including 'Sign-Ups' (visible to all) and a conditional 'Admin' link for authenticated admins, plus a branded footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and persisting identity across page reloads using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for submitting player sign-ups, fetching all sign-ups, and checking if the caller is an admin via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Barlow fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS, and defines a navy/gold design token theme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin page that displays all player sign-ups in a styled table with login/logout controls, accessible only to authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/pages/OwnerDashboard.tsx: Owner dashboard page that lists all player sign-ups in a table, with authentication controls and a refresh button, intended for the canister owner.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Public sign-up page with a form for players to register their name, contact info, position, and experience level, with capacity validation and a success confirmation state.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpsPage.tsx: A protected React page that displays a table of all Blue Panthers sign-ups, requiring Internet Identity authentication; unauthenticated users see a sign-in prompt instead of the list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with helpers to persist/retrieve values via sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom navy and gold color palettes using OKLCH, custom display/body font families, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for the Blue Panthers sign-up app, tracking existing features, pending architectural requests, and notes about the admin page being protected behind Internet Identity authentication.
